Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_1.Text: *: Gah! Me beautiful slime, Blodwen, lost a-bleedin'-gain! When's me luck gonna change, eh?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_1.Text: *: Do you wish to partake of the cooling waters? Water is the most valuable commodity of all to us desert peoples.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010_1.Text:
*: (glug glug glug)
Ahhh! I needed that!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010_2.Text: *: Crossing the desert is a nightmare, what with the horrible monsters and the crippling thirst...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010_3.Text: *: But one glimpse of the queen is enough to make it all worthwhile! She's incredible!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010_1.Text:
*: ♪ We-elcome, we-elcome bra-ave hero,
To Ibis, once founded by old King Faro!
Yaldedee-daldedee-daaa! ♪

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_010_1.Text: *: Well met, brave adventurer! Do you hear the voices of the dead floating to us upon the night wind? Verily, I do!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_010_2.Text:
*: ♪ Ohhh, now we sing and dance and jest,
Yet soon will come our final reeest!
Waililoo-waililah-woe! ♪

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_1.Text: Greetings to you. I am the philosopher Mocrates. I stand here every day to await the coming of night.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_2.Text: But when night approaches, I find myself yearning for the return of the day. Ahh, what a conundrum...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_010_1.Text: *: Mocrates's dilemma is not one to be sniffed at. After all, is it not a microcosm of life itself?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910_010_1.Text: *: Hm? You say you have come from far-off Aliahan? I have not heard of it. Some provincial backwater, I do not doubt...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_1.Text: *: This kingdom is ruled over by our most radiant and beautiful queen.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_2.Text: *: But of course, you know this. That is why you have come to visit us, yes? To glimpse her fair visage?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_010_1.Text: *: Well met, brave adventurer! Will you permit me to sing you a heartfelt ballad?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_010_2.Text:
*: ♪ Huzzah for the might of the meteorite, which powers the meteorite bracer...
It's a beauteous sight, surprisingly light, and makes one as swift as a racer! ♪

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1220_010_1.Text: *: Do not come any closer! Please, allow me to bathe in peace!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1220_010_2.Text: *: The sand sticks to everything so. It is most uncomfortable. This is why I come here to bathe.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1220_010_3.Text: *: But the desert nights are so very...ah...cold...ahh-TISHOO!

Txt_Talk_Isis_WeaponShop_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: In the northern part of the desert stands the great pyramid, ancestral burial place of our kings and queens.
*: I would dearly love to see it with my own eyes, but to look on its thousand-year-old splendour is forbidden.
*: It is a holy place, and those who trespass upon it without reason, or who plunder its treasures will most assuredly be cursed.

Txt_Talk_Isis_WeaponShop_SUB_0_ACTOR_032.Text: *: Zzz... Mmm... That vampire cat looks pretty tasty... Zzz... Gimme an 'undred on the little blighter... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Isis_WeaponShop_SUB_0_ACTOR_041.Text: *: Just the other day, 'cos I was all knackered from adventurin', I thought I'd 'ave a cheeky nap in this little spot wiv loads o' boulders about.
*: But I 'ad this funny feelin' the 'ole time. Couldn't even get no proper shuteye in the end.
*: ...You wot, mate? Ya wanna know where that spot was? Well, ya just go north-west from 'ere for a bit, innit. Ain't that far at all.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Church_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_01.Text: *: Many monsters are sensitive to loud noises. It can be difficult to pass them without arousing their attention...
*: But if you could walk around in near silence, as though on padded feet, you might be able to slip by undetected...

Txt_Talk_Isis_HouseA2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_.Text: *: My husband owns the weapon and item shop here in town. Ahh, he has such a head for business! Hee hee!

Txt_Talk_Isis_HouseA2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1220_.Text: *: Don't tell me<--->you're in the market for a nice new weapon, aren't you?
*: Then come and visit my shop in the daytime. You won't be disappointed!
*: So it's armour you're after, is it?
*: Ahh! You're after a meteorite bracer, aren't you? Well, don't tell anyone, but I heard they have one up at the palace...

Txt_Talk_Isis_HouseB2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_.Text: Greetings to you. I am the philosopher Mocrates. I stand here every night to await the coming of the day.
Oh, gentle sun... When will you rise at last...? And if I am not here to greet you, will you rise at all...?

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text:
*: Welcome, friend<IfSolo(,s)>.
Please, make yoursel<IfSolo(f,ves)> at home.

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: Please, you must not tell Her Majesty that I shirked my duties in order to come here! It is our secret, yes?

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_031.Text: *: Lo, I shall tell thee a tale...

*: ♪ Oh the queen, she snuck down to the monster arenaaa...
But the people pretended that they hadn't seen herrr! ♪

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_041.Text: *: I do not come here to simply take in the sights and sounds.
*: I am presently researching which combination of monsters makes the most effective team.
*: Do not misunderstand my intentions; I am not here to simply relax.
*: I am an avid monster watcher, you see. And if I have learnt anything, it is that brawn alone is never enough<--->a combination of balanced defence and frequent healing is the key to victory.

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_051.Text: *: Friend, did you happen to see which monster won the last fight?
*: I'll need to toughen my team up if I'm ever to beat them!
*: Friend, did you happen to see which monster won the last fight?
*: Icy monsters have been on top for a good while now. Time to tinker with my team so I can overcome them...

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_071.Text: *: What do you want from me? I will not move, you know! This is my place! Mine! I was here first!

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_091.Text: *: This superb stadium has borne witness to many a legendary battle, where monsters have risked life, limb and self-respect in the name of entertainment. This...is the monster arena!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Welcome to the Palace of Ibis, <IfSolo(wanderer,wanderers)>.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: Welcome to the Palace of Ibis.
*: You must be exhausted after crossing the vast expanse of the desert. Please, take your time and relax.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_041.Text: *: What're you looking at? I'm here to get that meteorite bracer, and no one's going to get in my way! No one, understand?
*: Wh-What? You swiped it already? Grr!
*: Well, you might've got the better of me this time, but I won't let it happen again!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Ahh, I could stare at the water forever... My elder brother, too, was captivated by its purity.
*: Where is he now, I wonder... It has been many moons since he left for Asham...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420.Text: *: Kahahahaaa! I serve the almighty Archfiend!
*: Forget your foolish plan to stand against him, and return to Aliahan where you belong!
*: Fail to do so, and a truly terrifying fate awaits you! Kahahahahaaa!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610.Text: *: From what I 'ear, that pyramid's got more tricks 'n' traps in it than treasures. You'd best watch yerself if yer 'eadin' that way...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620.Text: *: Ah-phew... Ah-phew... Mm? Gah, leave us alone, will ya? Come back in the mornin'... Mmm... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710.Text: *: The treasures here in the palace are the property of our beloved queen. Do not get any ideas, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0720.Text: *: Zzz... Ahhh! ...The cat! Possessed! Must save... Save the... Mmm... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810.Text: *: We guardsmen are entrusted with protecting the queen's treasures<--->and you may rest assured that we will do our duty.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910.Text: *: The pyramid is the ancestral resting place of the royal family, harbouring their noble remains...and their treasures.
*: It is the prospect of finding these riches that leads so many thieves to enter. (sigh) Is nothing sacred?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010.Text: *: You seem strong and reliable, wanderer. The queen is sure to like you.
*: You seem strong and reliable, wanderers. The queen is sure to like you.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110.Text: *: You have just crossed the desert, have you not? ...How do I know? Because your nose is peeling, silly! Hee hee!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1210.Text: *: You are an adventurer, yes? Then you are no doubt reckless enough to wish to visit the great pyramid.
*: You are adventurers, yes? Then you are no doubt reckless enough to wish to visit the great pyramid.
*: Then be warned<--->there are places within its walls where magic has no effect whatsoever...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: Those around me praise my beauty endlessly. But what use is beauty? Is it not fickle and fleeting?

Do not concern yourself with physical beauty.
Strive only to have a beautiful heart. Hearts do not grow haggard...
I know why you have come to my land. There is something you seek, is there not?
Well, I must warn you<--->Ibis is a dangerous place. Our ancestors, who built the great structures you now see ruined, did not take kindly to nosy adventurers.
Be it in the great pyramid to the north in the desert, or the catacombs below our feet, think twice before you decide to open any chests.
And with that, I bid you a safe journey.
Have you been able to pass beyond the Romarian outpost? If not, I suggest you seek an audience with the king of Romaria himself.
If anyone knows of a way through, it would be he.
And with that, I bid you a safe journey.
I know why you have come to me. You seek to reach a new land, do you not? One far across the ocean.
Well, you may wish to pay the king of Portoga a visit. He holds dominion over a nation of seafaring traders to the west of Romaria, and may be willing to assist you.
And with that, I bid you a safe journey.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: We are the handmaidens of Her Exalted Majesty.
*: Every little girl in Ibis dreams of being entrusted with our sacred duty.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: Our beloved queen fears no being of this world or any other.
*: Why, the Archfiend himself would fall to his knees before her incomparable beauty!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410.Text: *: Have you heard the innocent song of the children? It is said that in it lies the secret of the pyramid.
*: But though I have listened hard and often, I cannot make it out...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510.Text: *: It is my sworn duty to protect the queen<--->with my life, if necessary...
*: And I could not be happier! Ahh, to have her radiance greet me each and every day is pure bliss!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520.Text: *: Her Most Exalted Majesty has retired for the evening.
*: Perhaps you would be so kind as to try again in the morning?

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610.Text: *: For the sake of my queen, I would give my life in an instant! Ahh, my queen... (simper)

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810.Text:
*: ♪ Old King Faro had four buttons, and two of them he blessed...
First the eastest of the east, and then the westest of the west... ♪

*: ♪ The others he considered worse, and placed upon each one a curse...
So touch them not, by Faro's crown! Or we will all come tumbling down! ♪

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910.Text: *: Come, let us sing! Let us sing the song together!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920.Text: *: Ahh, the grass is so soft and fluffy... I could sleep for days... Ah-phew, ah-phew!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: This is Her Majesty's bedchamber. None may enter uninvited.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220.Text: *: Eek! There is a man! A man in our room! Help! Heeelp!
*: ...Ah. Forgive me! My eyes were clouded with sleep, and I... Well, you know... I am sorry.
*: ...Oh, the mere thought of being alone with a man! I hope to spend all of my days here in the palace, locked away from the beastly creatures...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320.Text: *: Hmph! Why would you wake me like this? Leave me be!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520.Text: *: Mmm... Zzz... Zzz... Long live Her...(snort)...Majesty! Mmm...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620.Text: *: I do not know what business you think you have here, but I would ask you politely to leave.
*: Heaven alone knows what manner of malicious rumour will arise if you are seen here...

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820.Text: I am pleased that you visited me under cover of darkness. Many are the suitors who come to the palace under false pretences. I could not lightly grant you an audience lest they take encouragement from my kindness.
Alas, I fear I can do little for you, but allow me at least to present you with a small gift.
Search the floor behind the head of my bed and you will find it...
I am pleased that you have come here under cover of darkness to see me.
Though it is a sacred privilege to be the ruler of this land, it is also a burden. One which I must bear from dawn to dusk.
I envy you your freedom to roam the world and do as you see fit... Truly I do.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_B2F_SearchObj_Treas.Text: *: Who dares disturb my slumber? ...Was it YOU?
*: Oh! My mistake! Pardon the intrusion.
*: ...And was it YOU who plundered the treasure chest before me?
*: Gosh, you're very honest, aren't you? Jolly good!
*: Well, don't let me keep you!

Txt_Talk_Isis_Castle_2F_SUB_0_VOLUME_001.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_Arena_SUB_0_SCE.Text: *: Welcome one, welcome all to the rank-3 tournament! The action is about to get underway!
*: Welcome one, welcome all to the rank-4 tournament! The action is about to get underway!
*: Without further ado, let's begin match 1! Could our contestants please step forward?

Txt_Talk_Isis_BattleRoad_Arena_SUB_0_BAT.Text: *: A breathtaking triumph! Victory in match number {VALUE} goes to the challenger!
*: But there's no time to waste<--->on to match number {VALUE}! Contestants, please step forward!
*: It's the moment you've all been waiting for<--->the final match of this tournament is about to commence!
*: Will this prove to be a classic in the making or the dampest of squibs? Let's find out!
*: Contestants, please step forward and prepare to fight!
*: It's time for the final match in the rank-3 tournament! Be sure not to blink!
*: Ready, set...brawl!
*: Oh my! The challenger has been bested! My heart goes out to them!
*: {LEADER}'s team has failed to win the rank-3 tournament, dropping out in match number {VALUE}! Better luck next time!
*: There we have it, folks! The winner of the rank-3 tournament is the challenger! What a match!
*: The only question is: can you do it again in the rank-4 tournament? I for one cannot wait to find out!
*: Everyone, please give it up for all of today's competitors! They've provided us with some splendid entertainment!
*: We'll see you again next time for more monster arena action! Thank you and farewell!
*: A breathtaking triumph! Victory in match number {VALUE} goes to the challenger!
*: But there's no time to waste<--->on to match number {VALUE}! Contestants, please step forward!
*: It's the moment you've all been waiting for<--->the final match of this tournament is about to commence!
*: Will this prove to be a classic in the making or the dampest of squibs? Let's find out!
*: Contestants, please step forward and prepare to fight!
*: It's time for the final match in the rank-4 tournament! Be sure not to blink!
*: Ready, set...brawl!
*: Oh my! The challenger has been bested! My heart goes out to them!
*: {LEADER}'s team has failed to win the rank-4 tournament, dropping out in match number {VALUE}! Better luck next time!
*: There we have it, folks! The winner of the rank-4 tournament is the challenger! What a match!
*: The only question is: can you do it again in the rank-5 tournament? I for one cannot wait to find out!
*: Everyone, please give it up for all of today's competitors! They've provided us with some splendid entertainment!
*: We'll see you again next time for more monster arena action! Thank you and farewell!
You have done well to make it this far, brave hero. However, I will not allow you to triumph in my nation's arena quite so easily.
Congratulations are in order. That was a fine fight and your team is by far the mightiest in all of Ibis. May your light shine bright on all the world for aeons to come.

Do not despair in defeat; it can be a lesson to us all, one we need only regret if we do not learn from it. Use this experience to grow stronger yet, and return anew to claim the victory your heart desires.

Txt_Talk_Isis_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1330_010_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
